```{r}
counts_mat <- read.table("D:/HSC_Autophagy/3.TFKO_data/Benchmark_TF_KO/Rhox10_KO/GSE82174_TPM_Matrix.txt/GSE82174_TPM_Matrix.txt",sep="\t",header=T,row.names=1)

KO_cells <- grep("^KO",colnames(counts_mat),value = T)
WT_cells <- grep("^WTp3",colnames(counts_mat),value = T)
all_cells <- c(rep("KO",length(KO_cells)),rep("WT",length(WT_cells)))
names(all_cells) <- c(KO_cells, WT_cells)

Rhox10_KO_mat <- counts_mat['Rhox10',c(KO_cells,WT_cells)]

apply(Rhox10_KO_mat,1,function(x){tapply(x,all_cells[names(x)],median)})

t.test(Rhox10_KO_mat[1,KO_cells],Rhox10_KO_mat[1,WT_cells])

```
